participant_1.background:
I like to take up new hobbies, like skiing, to keep my mind and body active.
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
i love 80s music.
I am a hard-working family man looking for a home that is perfect for my family.
i have three dogs and two cats.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday at a reptile zoo with my friends.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
my dad worked for home depot.
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.
i love to watch the voice.

content.text: Happy Friday! What are your plans for the weekend?
Hi! My plans for the weekend are to stay at home and relax. I have some foreign films that I'd like to watch.
That sounds relaxing. I have a couple of home projects that I need to finish. I'd like to start a new hobby soon.
What kind of hobby would you like to start?
I'm not sure yet. I'm open to suggestions. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to watch movies. I have a massive collection of foreign films. I also like to go to the reptile zoo with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a reptile zoo before.
You should check it out! It's really cool to see all the different types of reptiles.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! What's your favorite type of music?
I love 80s music.
Me too! I love listening to the oldies station. It always makes me feel happy.
Me too! It's so fun to sing along with the songs.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have three dogs and two cats.
That's a lot of pets! I bet they keep you busy.
They do! But they're also a lot of fun.
I'm sure they are. I love animals.
Me too! They're so cute and cuddly.
They are! I'm glad you're having a great weekend!
Thanks! You too!
